Method.name: Clear
Method.Implementation: $$$VAR kill ^WWWDataExDataMapping kill ^WWWDataExDataMappings kill ^WWWDataExMessageProp kill ^WWWDataExMessageProps kill ^WWWDataExMessage kill ^WWWDataExMessages kill ^WWWDataExchange kill ^WWWDataExchanges set strStatus=$$$Kill("WWW128","WWWDataExchange")

Method.name: Setup
Method.Implementation:
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Builds the data exchange configuration to Trakcare for UFH ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 30-Jul-2010 shobby SRAdhoc: HoldReason is piece 11. ; 29-Apr-2009 shobby BRAdhoc: Added FREE40 and FREE37 to TC_INC_Itm as per Steve's request. ; 12-Mar-2009 shobby BR014985: Disabled average cost. ; 12-Mar-2009 shobby BR014985: In the item master change UnitofMeasure to BaseUnit ; 11-Mar-2009 shobby SRAdHoc: Corrected name of supplier class (was using INKUNDE) Note:Currently disabled. ; 05-Jan-2009 shobby BR014985: After discussion with Tony, removed suppliers. ; 11-Nov-2008 shobby BR014985 Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- $$$VAR set ^WWWDataExDataMapping(0,"Primary Key","[comma]",1)="Â¸~" do START1^WWWSORTGEN("WWWDataExDataMapping",0)
;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemAverageCost",0,1)="TrakItemAverageCost~INARTAVG~TrakItemAverageCost" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemAverageCost",1,1)="Item~INARTAVG~Item" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemAverageCost",2,1)="Date1~INARTAVG~Date1" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemAverageCost",3,1)="Time1~INARTAVG~Time1" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemAverageCost",4,1)="NewAverageCost~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemGroup",0,1)="TrakItemGroup~INItemGroup~TrakItemGroup" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemGroup",1,1)="ID1~INItemGroup~ID1" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemGroup",2,1)="Description~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemGroup",3,1)="Acronym~~~~~~~{ID1}" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakItemGroup",4,1)="Active1~~~~~~~1" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",0,1)="TC_INC_Itm~INART~TC_INC_Itm~Primary Key~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",1,1)="ItemNumber~INART~ItemNumber~Primary Key~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",2,1)="SearchName~~~Primary Key~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",3,1)="BaseUnit~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",4,1)="ItemGroup~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",5,1)="AverageCostCALC~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",6,1)="SellableFrom~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",7,1)="SellableUntil~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",8,1)="PreferredSourcingLocation~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",9,1)="FREE40~~OTC~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",10,1)="FREE37~~BasePrice~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",11,1)="HoldReason~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",12,1)="UnitofMeasure~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_INC_Itm",13,1)="FREE23~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_UOM",0,1)="TC_CT_UOM~WWW101~TC_CT_UOM" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_UOM",1,1)="ParameterDescription~WWW101~ParameterDescription" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_UOM",2,1)="Language1~WWW101~Language1" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_UOM",3,1)="SearchItem~WWW101~SearchItem" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_UOM",4,1)="Text~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",0,1)="TrakSupplier~INLIEF~TrakSupplier" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",1,1)="SupplierNumber~INLIEF~SupplierNumber" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",2,1)="ShortName~~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",3,1)="Street~~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",4,1)="POBox~~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",5,1)="ZipCodeStreet~~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",6,1)="City~~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",7,1)="State~~~~~~~" ;set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TrakSupplier",8,1)="Country~~~~~~~" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_Loc",0,1)="TC_CT_Loc~WWW0121~TC_CT_Loc" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_Loc",1,1)="Company~WWW0121~Company" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_Loc",2,1)="Location~WWW0121~Location" set ^WWWDataExMessageProp(0,"TC_CT_Loc",3,1)="LocationName~~~~~~~" do START1^WWWSORTGEN("WWWDataExMessageProp",0)
;set ^WWWDataExMessage(0,"TrakItemAverageCost",1)="Item Average Cost~INARTAVG~0~126~1~" set ^WWWDataExMessage(0,"TrakItemGroup",1)="Item Group~INItemGroup~0~126~1~" set ^WWWDataExMessage(0,"TC_INC_Itm",1)="Item Master~INART~0~126~1~" set ^WWWDataExMessage(0,"TC_CT_UOM",1)="UOM~WWW101~0~126~1~""EINHEIT""" ;set ^WWWDataExMessage(0,"TrakSupplier",1)="Supplier~INLIEF~~126~1~" set ^WWWDataExMessage(0,"TC_CT_Loc",1)="Location~WWW0121~0~126~1~" do START1^WWWSORTGEN("WWWDataExMessage",0)
set ^WWWDataExchange(0,$$$NextKey("WWWDataExchange"),1)="WWW101~"_pstrRemoteSystem_"~0~TC_CT_UOM~~~1" set ^WWWDataExchange(0,$$$NextKey("WWWDataExchange"),1)="INART~"_pstrRemoteSystem_"~0~TC_INC_Itm~~~1" ;set ^WWWDataExchange(0,$$$NextKey("WWWDataExchange"),1)="INARTAVG~"_pstrRemoteSystem_"~0~TrakItemAverageCost~~~1" set ^WWWDataExchange(0,$$$NextKey("WWWDataExchange"),1)="INItemGroup~"_pstrRemoteSystem_"~0~TrakItemGroup~~~1" ;set ^WWWDataExchange(0,$$$NextKey("WWWDataExchange"),1)="INLIEF~"_pstrRemoteSystem_"~0~TrakSupplier~~~1" set ^WWWDataExchange(0,$$$NextKey("WWWDataExchange"),1)="WWW0121~"_pstrRemoteSystem_"~0~TC_CT_Loc~~~1" do START1^WWWSORTGEN("WWWDataExchange",0)
